comments: Also Integral_{-inf..inf} cos(x)/(1 + x^2) dx. - _Robert G. Wilson v_
references: Paul J. Nahin, "An Imaginary Tale, The Story of [Sqrt(-1)]," Princeton University Press, Princeton, NJ 1998, pg 188.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,20000
Solution of Problem 11771, The American Mathematical Monthly, 121 (2014).
mathematica: RealDigits[ Pi/E, 10, 110][[1]] (* Or *) RealDigits[ Integrate[ Cos[x]/(1 + x^2), {x, -Infinity, Infinity}], 10, 111][[1]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ Jan 15 2004 *)
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=Pi/exp(1); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b061382.txt", n, " ", d)) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 22 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 08 2001
